TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITemplatesHandler implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Org.Xml.Sax.IContentHandler, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: A SAX ContentHandler that may be used to process SAX parse events (parsing transformation instructions) into a Templates object.

remarks.para: A SAX ContentHandler that may be used to process SAX parse events (parsing transformation instructions) into a Templates object.
Note that TemplatesHandler does not need to implement LexicalHandler.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: Android.Runtime.Register("getSystemId", "()Ljava/lang/String;", "GetGetSystemIdHandler:Javax.Xml.Transform.Sax.ITemplatesHandlerInvoker, Mono.Android, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null")

Docs.summary: Get the base ID (URI or system ID) from where relative URLs will be resolved.

remarks.para:
Get method documentation [Android Documentation]
Get the base ID (URI or system ID) from where relative URLs will be resolved.

Set method documentation [Android Documentation]
Set the base ID (URI or system ID) for the Templates object created by this builder. This must be set in order to resolve relative URIs in the stylesheet. This must be called before the startDocument event.
